tred_extension.title: Alpino mode for Tred 2.0
tred_extension.copyright: Alexis Dimitriadis & Digital Humanities Lab, Utrecht University
tred_extension.description: Alpino file syntax and Tred macros, structured as a Tred 2 extension package by Alexis Dimitriadis. Extended with CHAT and Alpino editors by Jelte van Boheemen, Digital Humanities Lab @ Utrecht University.
